meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she chose to wear a blue dress.
meanings.sent2: I chose the red apple from the fruit bowl.
meanings.sent3: The cat chose to nap in the sunniest spot in the house.
meanings.sent4: The student chose the path of hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: He chose his words carefully before speaking.

meanings.sent1: The menu had many delicious choses to pick from.
meanings.sent2: Her favorite chose from the buffet was the pasta salad.
meanings.sent3: The store offered a wide range of choses for the customers.
meanings.sent4: The gift shop had unique choses for every visitor.
meanings.sent5: The library had a great chose of books for all ages.

meanings.definition: To decide or make a choice.
meanings.sent1: He always takes a long time to chose what to order at the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: She chose to go for a walk instead of watching TV.
meanings.sent3: The dog chose to chase its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The hiker chose the path less traveled by.
meanings.sent5: The child chose to share their toys with a new friend.
